input.sentences: there was a ice sculpture contest today .
people made many interesting things out of ice .
so many people showed up to enter in the contest .
it was amazing seeing them carve the ice .
it was a great day and we had a blast .
output.sentences: Here there are five squares with no pictures in them.
There is text that shows that the photos were originally from Flickr.
Apparently the photos are no longer available from that site.
The x that is inside a box that looks like a thumb-tacked sign makes that very clear.
Even without the English captions the fact that there is no photo to see is plain.
